data.oai_dc:dc: Data from: Seed dispersal by ungulates as an ecological filter: a trait-based meta-analysis

This files gathers data from 52 European studies analyzing seed dispersal by ungulates (endozoochory, epizoochory via fur, epizoochory via hooves): abundance of plant species found in dispersal samples and abundance of plant species found in the vegetation of the study site. We also included plant traits related to seed dispersal. Metadata are given on the second sheet.
